title: Looking for pixel font equivalent for Georgia 11pt
content:
What FontForFlash ... or Pixel type font would be similar to Georgia sz.11?  
Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Robert Wright "Nonzerø" book cover - Rotis Semi Serif {Stephen Lording}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134231/http:/typophile.com/node/27541 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Gnostech italic humanist sans - Myriad {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134231/http:/typophile.com/node/27589 "Go to next forum topic")
author: link

comments.content: I think MiniTime is as close as I can get ?

I’m certainly no expert in this area but i think you should be able to use Georgia itself. If you’re viewing this web page on a PC then you’re probably reading 9pt Georgia right now.

I’ve not used Flash but i believe you can turn off antialiasing to make Georgia render as a pixel font like you can in Photoshop. I think most of the Windows system fonts were specifically designed to work this way.

I may be wrong on some or all of the above, or i may have misunderstood your question. It’s been a long day.
